thread.title: BUZZ-European telcos hit a bump as TeliaSonera and Telenor call off Danish merger
thread.title_full: BUZZ-European telcos hit a bump as TeliaSonera and Telenor call off Danish merger

title: BUZZ-European telcos hit a bump as TeliaSonera and Telenor call off Danish merger
text:
11.65 -0.16 
** TDC (Copenhagen: TDC.CO - news ) falls 5.9 pct to lows not seen since November 2012 after TeliaSonera (Amsterdam: 1087941.AS - news ) and Telenor (EUREX: 1160189.EX - news ) call off plans to merge their Danish unit 
** Merger blocked by the European Commision 
** TDC has struggled with increased competition in the Danish market compared with other European countries 
** Suggestion from some analysts co will struggle to maintain its dividend 
** Top faller on Stoxx 600 and among most traded by average 30-day volumes 
** Trader says telco sector being sold on increased uncertainty surrounding European Commission's position on other mergers. Sector index off 1.9 pct 
** Telecom Italia (Other OTC: TIAJF - news ) , Telefonica (Amsterdam: TA6.AS - news ) , Cable & Wireless, Vodafone, BT and Bouygues (Swiss: 487662.SW - news ) all in top 20 fallers on Stoxx, down 1.2-3 pct 
** In Hong Kong, CK Hutchison Holdings off 2.5 pct into the close as regulator uncertainty rises. Co has said it expects to receive approval for its mergers in UK and Italy next year (RM (LSE: RM.L - news ) : alasdair.pal.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net)
